name: Modern K-Art: Auction House
description:
Movement

WASD / Controller (recommended)

Bullet Time

Spacebar / Controller (A button)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This was made for https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam-ii.  In this hellish Art Auction, players will need to determine the true value of a painting under serious pressure. To fully understand a painting's value: dodge distractions, collect insight, and determine the correct clue.

This is a bullet hell and guessing game hybrid. You will be given clues for every painting, but only one is correct. Figuring out the correct word will become easier by collecting orbs -- and don't get hit. If you lose 3 lives you'll fall behind.

Chrome: If you're experiencing lag while using Chrome, make sure you have hardware acceleration enable. Settings/System/Use hardware acceleration
